board.name: Twitter
board.description:
Twitter (auto-tweet) is part of the "idibu social" range of integrations, working alongside our Facebook app and Linkedin services.

It will automatically create a tweet into your Twitter account with job title, salary, sector and location information - plus tags - and a tinyurl that links the tweet to the full job vacancy information, where the candidate can apply.

board.name: eFinancial Careers
board.description: eFinancialCareers, a Dice Holdings company, serves the global financial community network of career sites for professionals working in banking and the financial markets and those firms seeking to employ them.

board.name: Facebook
board.description: Use the idibu Facebook app to add a free board listing to your company page.
